inclCriterium: Monoallelic MLH1, MSH6, MSH2 or PMS2 proven pathogenic germline variant
Unexplained patient with CRC <30y or 3 FDR with CRC <45y
Unexplained patient with > 100 adenomatous polyps or > 2 Peutz-Jeghers type (hamartomatous) or > 2 juvenile polyps
Unexplained patient with BC <30y or 3 FDR with BC <45y
Unexplained patient with EOC <30y or 3 FDR with EOC <45y
Unexplained patient with clinical syndromic criteria
